text: “Mũrũ wa mũndũ, Mwathani Jehova ekuuga ũũ: Ĩta nyoni cia mĩthemba yothe, na nyamũ ciothe cia gĩthaka, ũciĩre atĩrĩ: ‘Ũnganai mũcookanĩrĩre hamwe kuuma kũndũ guothe, mũũke igongona-inĩ inene rĩrĩa ndĩrahaarĩria nĩ ũndũ wanyu, igongona inene kũu irĩma-igũrũ cia bũrũri wa Isiraeli. Kũu nĩkuo mũkaarĩĩra nyama na mũnyuĩre thakame.
